Question: Kara Water CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Kara Water

Kara Pod

- A coffee maker that collects water vapor from the air to produce purified, mineral-rich, and alkaline water
- Water tank holds just over three liters, equivalent to seven bottles of water
- Touch screen for selecting pour sizes and dispensing water at room temperature or hot water
- Dimensions: 15 x 9 x 14 inches (LxWxH), weight: 13 pounds
- Supports automatic shut off and Wi-Fi connectivity for automatic updates
- Includes 12 Kara coffee pods, capable of making up to 18 cups a day
- Inspired by the Namibian desert beetle's water collection technology
- Available in black, white, or beige for pre-order at $249

Kara Pure

- Air-to-water dispenser producing up to 10 liters of alkaline water per day
- Dimensions: H 42” x W 16” x D 10”, Weight: 61lbs
- Power: 110-120 or 22O-240Va.c. 50-60Hz, Power Consumption: 588W
- Water Output Purity: 99.9999%
- Construction: Stainless steel, BPA Free
- Ionized, Mineral, Antioxidant, Anti-bacterial water properties
- 1-year warranty, easy filter change once per year
- Replacement Filter Set available
- Luxury, sleek, and available for pre-order at $3,173.00
Summary_cn:
卡拉水

卡拉豆荚

- 一种咖啡壶，它从空气中收集水蒸气以生产纯净、富含矿物质和碱性的水
- 水箱容量超过三升，相当于七瓶水
- 触摸屏可选择倒水量和提供室温或热水
- 尺寸：15 x 9 x 14 英寸（长x宽x高），重量：13 磅
- 支持自动关闭和Wi-Fi连接以进行自动更新
- 包括12个卡拉咖啡豆荚，可制作高达18杯咖啡
- 受纳米比亚沙漠甲壳虫的水收集技术启发
- 可在黑色、白色或米色供预订，价格为249美元

卡拉纯净

- 空气转换为水的分配器，每天可产生高达10升的碱性水
- 尺寸：高42英寸 x 宽16英寸 x 深10英寸，重量：61磅
- 电源：110-120或22O-240V交流50-60Hz，功耗：588W
- 净水输出纯度：99.9999%
- 结构：不锈钢，不含BPA
- 离子化、矿物质、抗氧化、抗菌水特性
- 1年保修，每年更换易于更换的滤芯
- 可获得替换滤芯套装
- 豪华、时尚，可预订，价格为3,173.00美元
